details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Drakkinnite, Lantic, Gon, and the members of the Mo Xuan Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Heir of the Divine
extraContent.content:
Mo Xuan has two main attack skills that consists of two parts, [Strike] and [Cross] (unlocked in 4th Job) that are activated using:

  • Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)
  • Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)

By pressing the Skill Key, the attack will alternate between [Strike] and [Cross]. Additionally, Mo Xuan have skills labelled as "Divine Art" that interact with these attacks. "Divine Art" skills are also divided into [Tian] and [Di] alignments that correspond with the two main attacks

In 3rd Job, Mo Xuan unlocks The Holy Mountain that grants the following effects when "Divine Art" skills are used after casting or :

  • [Form Link]: The linked "Divine Art" skill deals increased %Final Damage
  • [Divine Fist]: Grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (additive)

In 4th Job, Mo Xuan unlocks Heir of the Divine that adds another effect:

  • [Reincarnation]: Briefly after using a "Divine Art" skill, based on their alignment [Tian] or [Di], the next "Divine Art" skill used has different effects. If the alignments are the same, the cooldown of the skill is reduced. If the alignments are different, the attack deals increased %Final Damage

Below are the skills that trigger [Form Link] using [Strike]:

  • Divine Art: Erupting Flame (1st Job)
  • Divine Art: Tearing Wind (2nd Job)
  • Divine Art: Righteous Thunder (3rd Job)
  • Divine Art: Swirling Tide (3rd Job)

Below are the skills that trigger [Form Link] using [Cross]:

  • Divine Art: Howling Storm (4th Job)
  • Divine Art: Crashing Earth (4th Job)

primary.name: Return to Xuanshan
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to the Xuanshan School.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Xuanshan Spirit
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +10%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec, Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Xuanshan Arts [Tian]
primary.shortDesc: Activates [Tian] Xuanshan forms upon use.\nActivates 1 hit after learning Xuanshan Strike [Tian].\nActivates up to 2 hits after learning Xuanshan Cross [Tian].
primary.desc: Using this skill activates <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Tian] (1st Job)}> [Strike]
details: Upon learning <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-cross-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Cross [Tian] (4th Job)}> [Cross] in 4th Job, pressing the Skill Key again will activate the attack

Skills labelled as "Divine Art" gain bonus effects from <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/the-holy-mountain.png} tip={The Holy Mountain (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/heir-of-the-divine.png} tip={Heir of the Divine (4th Job)}> upon using after [Strike] or [Cross]

primary.name: Xuanshan Strike [Tian]
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10\nXuanshan Strike [Tian] - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 60%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Punch forward
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Divine Art: Erupting Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Form Link] Final Damage: +50%
primary.desc: Punch forward releasing a blast of energy
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline
After 3rd Job, deals increased %Final Damage when used after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> [Strike]

primary.name: Secret Art: Air Weaving
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Secret Art: Dancing Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, jump upward a certain distance
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

primary.name: Awaken
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Attack Power: +50\nRestores 3% of Max HP/MP every 3 sec, even in combat.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +30, Attack Power: +20

primary.name: Xuanshan Arts [Di]
primary.shortDesc: Activates [Di] Xuanshan forms upon use.\nActivates 1 hit after learning Xuanshan Strike [Di].\nActivates up to 2 hits upon learning Xuanshan Cross [Di].
primary.desc: Using this skill activates <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Di] (2nd Job)}> [Strike]
details: Upon learning <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-cross-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Cross [Di] (4th Job)}> [Cross] in 4th Job, pressing the Skill Key again will activate the attack

Skills labelled as "Divine Art" gain bonus effects from <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/the-holy-mountain.png} tip={The Holy Mountain (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/heir-of-the-divine.png} tip={Heir of the Divine (4th Job)}> upon using after [Strike] or [Cross]

primary.name: Xuanshan Strike [Di]
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 22
Xuanshan Strike [Di] - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 110%, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: Kick forward
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Divine Art: Tearing Wind
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 9\n[Form Link] Final Damage: +50%\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Kick forward releasing a blast of energy
details: After 3rd Job, deals increased %Final Damage when used after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}> [Strike]

primary.name: Secret Art: Fists of Fury
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20

primary.name: Agility Training
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +50, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: High-Intensity Training
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +30, Defense: +300, Max HP: +20%\nDamage Taken: -10%, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Martial Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Martial Brace Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30

primary.name: Secret Art: Arrow Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, quickly move forward.\nCharged once every 4 sec, Max Consecutive Uses: 5
primary.desc: Dash forward or in the direction of the Arrow Key pressed
details: Skill is prepared every 4 sec (up to 5 dashes)<bp_Dashes can be used consecutively up to 5 times_>

primary.name: The Holy Mountain
primary.shortDesc: After linking a Divine Art with an appropriate form, you gain both the Form Link effect and the Divine Fist effect, which can be stacked up to 3 times. Lasts 45 sec for each stack of Divine Fist, Final Damage: +3%
primary.desc: Upon successfully linking a skill by using "Divine Art" skill after casting <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}>, gain the following effects:
details: [Form Link]: The linked "Divine Art" skill deals increased %Final Damage
[Divine Link]: Grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (additive)

primary.name: Divine Art: Righteous Thunder
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 9
[Form Link] Final Damage: +100%
Incapacitates hit enemies for 3 sec
Incapacitated enemeis will be immune to Divine Art: Righteous Thunder for 45 sec
Cooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: Punch forward binding enemies struck
details: Bind effect has a separate cooldown from other bind skills
Deals increased %Final Damage when used after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> [Strike]

primary.name: Divine Art: Swirling Tide
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 430%, Number of Attacks: 9\n[Form Link] Final Damage: +100%\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Kick forward consecutively up to two times by pressing the Skill Key
details: Deals increased %Final Damage when used after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}> [Strike]

primary.name: Secret Art: Qi Projection
primary.shortDesc: When the effect is active, activate up to 4 afterimages that deal 400% damage 3 times.\nAfterimages attack every 1.5 sec
primary.desc: While active, periodically afterimages attack nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Divine Art Training I
primary.shortDesc: Divine Art: Erupting Flame - Damage: +160% points\nDivine Art: Tearing Wind - Damage: +60% points
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-erupting-flame.png} tip={Divine Art: Erupting Flame (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-tearing-wind.png} tip={Divine Art: Tearing Wind (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Secret Art: Flash Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, moves back a short distance\nCooldown: 6 sec\n[Passive Effect - Avoidability: +20%]
primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.name: Martial Discipline
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Defense: +50%

primary.name: Qi Within
primary.shortDesc: Critical Damage: +10%, Damage: +30%, Attack Power: +20

primary.name: Heir of the Divine
primary.shortDesc: [Reincarnation] Cooldown Reduction: 25%, Final Damage: +50%\n[Divine Fist] Increases max stacks to 5. For each stack of Divine Fist, increases duration to 60 sec and Final Damage by 10%.
primary.desc: Enhances [Divine Fist] and now grants [Reincarnation] when a Divine Art is used while [Reincarnation] is not active
details: [Reincarnation]: Briefly after using a "Divine Art" skill, based on their alignment [Tian] or [Di], the next "Divine Art" skill used has different effects:<bp_[Same Alignment]: The cooldown of the skill is reduced_[Different Alignment]: The attack deals increased %Final Damage_>
[Divine Fist]: Increases max stacks from 3 to 5 and increases duration and %Final Damage gained per stack

primary.name: Xuanshan Cross [Tian]
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40\nXuanshan Cross [Tian] - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 6\nXuanshan Strike [Tian] Damage: +240% points
primary.desc: Using <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}>, punch forward [Cross] after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Tian] (1st Job)}> [Strike]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Tian] (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Attack has two different animations that it alternates between

primary.name: Xuanshan Cross [Di]
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40\nXuanshan Cross [Di] - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 6\nXuanshan Strike [Di] Damage: +160% points
primary.desc: Using <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}>, kick forward [Cross] after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Di] (2nd Job)}> [Strike]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-strike-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Strike [Di] (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
Attack has two different animations that it alternates between

primary.name: Divine Art Training II
primary.shortDesc:
Divine Art: Erupting Flame - Damage: +60% points
Divine Art: Tearing Wind - Damage: +30% points
Divine Art: Righteous Thunder - Damage: +350% points
Divine Art: Swirling Tide - Damage: +140% points
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-erupting-flame.png} tip={Divine Art: Erupting Flame (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-tearing-wind.png} tip={Divine Art: Tearing Wind (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-righteous-thunder.png} tip={Divine Art: Righteous Thunder (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/divine-art-swirling-tide.png} tip={Divine Art: Swirling Tide (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Divine Art: Howling Storm
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 3 while the key is held, Duration: every 0.2 sec up to 5 sec
Upon releasing the key or after the attack finishes, triggers a finishing blow dealing 430% damage to 8 enemies 12 times. Super Knockback Resistance is applied while the key is held.
[Form Link] Final Damage: +100%
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: While held, release a flurry of punches foward
details: At the end of the attack, deal a finishing blow
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Deals increased %Final Damage when used after <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> [Cross]

primary.name: Secret Art: Qi Disruption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, deal 540% damage 12 times to enemy with the highest Max HP within range, incapacitate the attack enemy for 10 sec\nIncreases incapacitation duration up to 100% based on the damage dealt with Secret Art: Qi Distruption.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Kick forward binding enemies struck
details: Prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP

primary.name: Secret Art: Divine Fist Disciples
primary.shortDesc:
Increases Critical Damage of nearby party members by 8% for 30 sec.
If Mo Xuan has a max stack of Divine Fist when casting, the effect will increase the Critical Damage of nearby party members by an additional 2%.
Cooldown: 180 sec
[Passive Effect - Critical Damage: +5%]
primary.desc: When used, grants party members increased %Crit Damage (excluding Mo Xuan)
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage
While [Divine Fist] is at max stacks, the %Crit Damage provided is increased
Mo Xuan cannot receive the active effect

primary.name: Secret Art: Qi Shield
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, creates a protective shield that blocks enemy attacks for 20 sec
Reduces damage taken from the first attack after casting by 100%, including attacks based on Max HP. Afterwards, reduces efficiency by 15% for every hit, with a minimum of 20%
Cooldown: 180 sec
[Passive Effect - Damage Taken: -20%]
primary.desc: When used, grants a shield that reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanently reduces %Damage Taken (not including %Max HP attacks)
While active, the amount of damage blocked starts at 100% and is reduced per attack taken by 15% (Min. 20%)
Unaffected by %Buff Duration

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Aura
primary.shortDesc: Boss Damage: +20%, Ignore Defense: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Boundless
primary.shortDesc: Martial Brace Mastery: +70%\nAttack Power: +30, Ignore Defense: +20%

hyperPassive.name: Xuanshan Forms - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Xuanshan Forms - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Xuanshan Forms - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Divine Arts - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Reincarnation Cooldown Reduction Enhancement: 5%, Reincarnation Final Damage Enhancement: 5%\n(Enhancement value is cumulative)

hyperPassive.name: Awaken - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recovery Ration: +3% on top of existing recovery.

hyperPassive.name: Qi Shield - Shield Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Reduces the efficiency reduction when hit by 10%

hyperPassive.name: Divine Fist - Persist
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Divine Fist Duration: +30 sec on top of existing duration

hyperActive.name: Secret Art: Strength Within
hyperActive.shortDesc: Instantly obtain the maximum amount of Divine Fist upon use.\nCooldown: 60 sec\n[Passive Effect - Final Damage: +10%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage

hyperActive.name: Soul Art: Black Wind
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 12, Explosions: 10, invincible during casting\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: You are invincible while casting
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Aura of Destiny
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Jianghu jobs in the party.

fifthMain.name: Soul Art: Beneath Heaven
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 12, Explosions: 24, Invinciblity Duration: 4 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Release an attack that damages enemies in a large area
details: You are invincible while casting

fifthMain.name: Soul Art: The Conquered Self
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 900, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Afterimages: 9\nAfterimage attacks every 1.5 sec, Secret Art: Qi Projection deactivates.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/secret-art-qi-projection.png} tip={Secret Art: Qi Projection (3rd Job)}> resulting in a stronger attack and more afterimages created
details: Afterimages from <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/secret-art-qi-projection.png} tip={Secret Art: Qi Projection (3rd Job)}> will not activate while this skill is active<bp_When this skill ends, <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/secret-art-qi-projection.png} tip={Secret Art: Qi Projection (3rd Job)}> will be reactivated_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Soul Art: The Opened Gate
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 650, all attacks are critical for 30 sec, Critical Damage: +25%\nIncreases Xuanshan Form and Divine Art damage by 350% while active, Number of Attacks: +2 (the extra attacks from Soul Art: The Opened Gate cannot exceed 15)\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, gain the following effects:
details: All attacks are guaranteed Critical Hits and gain increased %Crit Damage
"Xuanshan Form" and "Divine Art" attacks gain increased %Damage and increased Number of Attacks (cannot exceed 15 attacks)

fifthMain.name: Divine Art: Crashing Earth
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 9, Shock Waves: 5\n[Form Link] Final Damage: +100%\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: Deals increased %Final Damage when used while casting <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}> [Cross]

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-tian.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Tian] (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/mo-xuan/xuanshan-arts-di.png} tip={Xuanshan Arts [Di] (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Xuanshan Arts [Tian]
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55\nHEXA Xuanshan Strike [Tian] - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 6\nHEXA Xuanshan Cross [Tian] - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55\nHEXA Xuanshan Strike [Di] - Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 590%, Number of Attacks: 6\nHEXA Xuanshan Cross [Di] - Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 590%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Divine Art: Howling Storm
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 680%, Number of Attacks: 4 while the key is held, Duration: every 0.2 sec up to 3 sec
Upon releasing the key or after the attack finishes, triggers a finishing blow dealing 830% damage to 8 enemies 12 times. Super Knockback Resistance is applied while the key is held.
[Form Link] Final Damage: +100%
Cooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Soul Art: Jianghu Dragon
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 4980%, Number of Attacks: 8, Chase Cuts: 8. Afterwards, Damage: 5880%, Number of Attacks: 10, Finishing Blows: 16\nAfter the finishing blow, Divine Fist does not decrease for 120 sec\nCooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: Soul Art: Black Wind - Hyper Skill

meta: Mo Xuan is a DEX pirate class part of the Jianghu. Mo Xuan utilize Martial Braces as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Mo Xuan can equip Brace Bands
